channel.title: Damián Pumar
channel.description: Damián Pumar resume, blog and events website.

item.title: Frontend dependency injection container
item.description: do you know what dependency injection is? How do dependency injection containers work? In this post I will explain how it works and how you can implement it in your project, we will see the advantages, disadvantages with code examples.

item.title: Reuse Vue component in a directive ♻️
item.description: Reuse vue component in a directive without duplicate code or create vanilla javascript replicating this behavior.
